text: Uye pakati pavo pane avo vanotsvinyira muporofita (Muhammad (SAW)) uye vachiti: “Arikuteya nzeve dzake kuti anzwe zvose.” Iti: “Anoteerera chete izvo zvakanaka kwamuri; anotenda muna Allah; anovimba nevatendi; uye inyasha kune vamwe venyu vanotenda. Asi avo vanotsvinyira mutumwa waAllah (Muhammad (SAW)), vachawana murango unorwadza
